TopicTitle: Time Warp at the Facilities View Doesn't Work?

Articles.Content:
I'll be brief. I have a time warp function at the facilities view [carrier mode] not doing anything. I just want to make sure it works in vanilla version since I'm hooked on tons of mods and I'm too lazy to manipulate with my Data folder. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks.
By "Facilities View" do you mean the view of the space center? I have tons of mods (had to remove some becuase of memory issues) and time warp a lot. Never had a problem.
